definition.value:
Sɛ wopɛ sɛ sms-messaging yɛ adwuma a kɔ System -> Settings -> IM
na paw TextMarketer sɛ default sms-driver. Mma wo werɛ mmfi sɛ wobɛma ɔfã a wopɛ sɛ wo nsa ka sms fi (admin anaa storefront) no yɛ adwuma.
Saa ntrɛwmu yi bɛma Mobile Phone field no atumi ama admins ne customers de ama. Kae sɛ sɛ wogyae saa ntrɛwmu yi a, ɛbɛma saa afuw yi asie. Sɛ wode ka sotɔɔ a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw a adetɔfo ka ho a, ma ɛntra w’adwenem sɛ saa nsɛm yi bɛyera.
API Asɛmfua a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Originator: Hena na nkra no fi (nea ɔhyɛɛ ase anaa nea ɔde kɔmaa no ID). Eyi betumi ayɛ alfa-numeric nkyerɛwde 11 anaa akontaahyɛde nkutoo nkyerɛwde 16.
Mfomso Logging Status Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wo log mfomso nyinaa wɔ TextMarketer ntrɛwmu mu a dan nhyehyɛe yi ON.
Mobile Phone a Wɔde Di Dwuma
Sɔ Wo Nkitahodi Hwɛ: Wubetumi asɔ ahwɛ sɛ API adansedi nkrataa a wode ahyɛ mu no teɛ anaa.
Mfomsoɔ! Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ sɛ wɔadan extension no ON anaa.
Mfomsoɔ! Yɛsrɛ sɛ fa nea wogye no telefon nɔma to hɔ.
Hwɛ mfomso ho kyerɛwtohɔ ma nsɛm no mu nsɛm.
Nkitahodi no ayɛ yiye na wɔahyehyɛ API Credentials no yiye.
